name: Phuong Bui Thanh
title: Frontend Architect & Team Lead
bio: 8+ years building high-performance web applications. Expert in Angular & React/NextJS with proven leadership managing frontend teams. Specialized in architecture, performance optimization, and delivering enterprise-scale solutions.
summary: Senior Frontend Developer with 8+ years of experience in developing high-performance web applications. Proven leadership as Frontend Team Lead managing developers, setting coding conventions, and designing scalable architectures. Strong in performance optimization, SEO best practices, and testing.
